items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 100 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 21!

user.bio: Bicycling, contrabassist, brewing beer, books, photography, and gardening. On Mastodon and Bluesky. Find me.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 240 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 49!

items.checkin_comment: Think dark roasted rye, think Miche bread, think vague banana afterglow…. solid body …. But the moniker is misleading, granoloa to my thinking is overly sweet, roasted and drenched in honey or maple syrup - this is not that!

user.bio: I'm here for the craic! No friends who don't comment when they check in. Check ins without a comment are boring.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 310 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 63!

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 2!
